00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_CELLS_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_CELLS_H

00025 #include <vector>

00027 #include "Common/CharArena.h"
00028 #include "Cell.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Hypertable {
00031 
00032   typedef std::vector<Cell> Cells;
00033 
00034   class CellsBuilder {
00035   public:
00036     CellsBuilder() {}
00037 
00038     void add(const Cell &cell, bool own = true) {
00039       if (!own) {
00040         m_cells.push_back(cell);
00041         return;
00042       }
00043       Cell copy;
00044 
00045       if (cell.row_key)
00046         copy.row_key = m_alloc.dup(cell.row_key);
00047 
00048       if (cell.column_family)
00049         copy.column_family = m_alloc.dup(cell.column_family);
00050 
00051       if (cell.column_qualifier)
00052         copy.column_qualifier = m_alloc.dup(cell.column_qualifier);
00053 
00054       copy.timestamp = cell.timestamp;
00055       copy.revision = cell.revision;
00056 
00057       if (cell.value) {
00058         copy.value = (uint8_t *)m_alloc.dup(cell.value, cell.value_len);
00059         copy.value_len = cell.value_len;
00060       }
00061       copy.flag = cell.flag;
00062       m_cells.push_back(copy);
00063     }
00064 
00065     Cells &get() { return m_cells; }
00066     const Cells &get() const { return m_cells; }
00067 
00068     void swap(CellsBuilder &x) {
00069       m_cells.swap(x.m_cells);
00070       m_alloc.swap(x.m_alloc);
00071     }
00072 
00073   private:
00074     Cells m_cells;
00075     CharArena m_alloc;
00076   };
00077 
00078 } // namespace Hypertable
00079 
00080 #endif // HYPERTABLE_CELLS_H
